import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' import { useRef,useState } from 'react' import Booking from '../Components/Booking/Booking'; import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter'; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef=useRef('') const [tourRating,setTourRating]=useState(null) const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); //destructure properties from tour object const { title, city, distance, price, maxGroupSize, desc, photo, reviews,address} = tour; const { totalRating,avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options={day:'numeric',month:'long',year:'numeric'} const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value; }; return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating===0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating===0 ? ('Not rated') : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price}per person {distance}km {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* =============tour review section start======================== */}

Reviews({reviews?.length}reviews)

setTourRating(1)}>1 setTourRating(2)}>2 setTourRating(3)}>3 setTourRating(4)}>4 setTourRating(5)}>5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
Karthikeya

{new Date('08-12-2024').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

5
Amazing Tour
Karthikeya

{new Date('08-12-2024').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

5
Amazing Tour
Karthikeya

{new Date('08-12-2024').toLocaleDateString('en-US',options)}

5
Amazing Tour
)) }
{/* =============tour review section end======================== */}
) }; export default TourDetails;
